campaignMetadata.title: End Child Labor in Cocoa Supply Chains
campaignMetadata.description: A campaign targeting Nestlé's continued failure to eliminate child labor from its cocoa supply chains in West Africa despite repeated pledges.

targets.reason: Child labor in cocoa supply chains.
targets.additionalDetails: Nestlé has repeatedly failed to eliminate child labor from its cocoa supply chains in West Africa. Investigations have revealed children as young as 10 working in hazardous conditions on cocoa farms supplying Nestlé, often working 12+ hour days with no access to education. Despite pledges to eradicate child labor by 2005, then 2010, then 2020, Nestlé continues to profit from this exploitation.

citations.title: Nestlé's Broken Promises on Child Labor
